availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Illinois native. Married to Nancy J. Atherton. Father of Calvin A. Atherton, Martha E. Atherton, Mary A. Atherton, Mildred C. Atherton, Richard P. Atherton, and William H. Atherton. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850. Resident in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn, p. 275B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Cobbs District, p. 118-19.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 3, p. 6-7.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 1.
